about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the world of Aquilon Lust with this exclusive desktop wallpaper pack! This collection features high-quality PNG images crafted with exceptional attention to detail. The pack includes:

  • Character: Unique illustrations showcasing the charm and style of the game’s characters.

  • H-Scene: Passionate and intriguing scenes brought to life in the signature style of the game.

  • Locations: Stunning depictions of the game’s vibrant environments, from cozy apartments to atmospheric action scenes.

This pack is a must-have for fans of the game, allowing you to bring your favorite moments to your screen. Customize your desktop with the vibrant art of Aquilon Lust and enjoy its charm every day!

File Format: PNG
Resolution: Suitable for Full HD

content_descriptors.notes: The images contains scenes of a sexual nature, and light erotic scenes. All characters depicted in this game are over 21 years of age
